# Security

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Found a security issue? We take security seriously and appreciate your help keeping rari safe.

**Report privately:**
- [Submit through GitHub Security](https://github.com/rari-build/rari/security/advisories/new) (preferred)
- Email **security@rari.build** if GitHub isn't an option

We'll verify and address reported issues promptly.

## Keeping Your App Secure

While security vulnerabilities in rari are uncommon, you can keep your application secure by:

- Using the latest version of rari and all dependencies
- Keeping your lock files up to date (`pnpm-lock.yaml`, `package-lock.json`, `yarn.lock`, `bun.lock`)
